channel.title: Freeman's Mind!
channel.description:
Just wanted to let you guys know that the final episode of Freeman's Mind (for at least Half-Life 1) has been released!
Go check it out! [url]https://www.accursedfarms.com/[/url]

item.title: Freeman's Mind!
item.dc:creator: Racket_Man
item.description:
I have been following the Freeman’s Mind series almost from the beginning. I do not even remember how I found it.

Thanks for the series Ross. It was GREAT

Checked out Barney’s and Shepard’s Mind because of it.

If you watch the “credits” you will see SOOOOO many comments containing the phrase “WHAT GAME IS THIS? (#1 asked question)” or “What console can I play this on?” or “Is this ?”

and YES the last 30 seconds are hilarious.

Read full topic

item.title: Freeman's Mind!
item.dc:creator: Chickenprotector
item.description:
Dat alternate ending… In all seriousness, he deserves to take a break, he busted his ass to get the content out on time.

Read full topic
